API_Description: Adds a new page to the active document.

nPage.description: (optional) The page after which to add the new page in a 1-based page numbering system. The default is the last page of the document. Use 0 to add a page before the first page. An invalid page range is truncated to the valid range of pages.

nWidth.description: (optional) The width of the page in points. The default value is 612.

nHeight.description: (optional) The height of the page in points. The default value is 792.
